::: row
::: {.col .col--12}
# FAQ

## Account[​](#account "Direct link to Account"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Account"} {#account .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

### Cannot sign in to my account[​](#cannot-sign-in-to-my-account "Direct link to Cannot sign in to my account"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Cannot sign in to my account"} {#cannot-sign-in-to-my-account .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

If you see the message 「your account has been temporarily suspended」
while logging in，this indicates that your account has triggered
suspension protocols due to potential violations of the platform usage
guidelines.

If you believe this is an error, please contact us by filling out the
[「Account Suspension
Appeal」](https://trtgsjkv6r.feishu.cn/share/base/form/shrcn13OBmQ3oXJKYLdHjUfeDHh){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"} form. We will carefully review your appeal as
soon as possible. Most reviews are completed within 3 business days.
Once approved, you can log in and use the service immediately. Thank you
for your patience and understanding!

### Cannot register with my email[​](#cannot-register-with-my-email "Direct link to Cannot register with my email"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Cannot register with my email"} {#cannot-register-with-my-email .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

If you encounter an error message saying \"Login failed. Your email
domain is currently not supported for registration.\" during
registration, it is because your email is not supported by DeepSeek. We
recommend signing up with a major international email provider such as
Gmail, Outlook, Hotmail, or Yahoo.

If the issue persists, contact
[service@deepseek.com](mailto:service@deepseek.com){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"}.

### Deleting Account[​](#deleting-account "Direct link to Deleting Account"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Deleting Account"} {#deleting-account .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

You can request account deletion via the following path:

[「Profile」](https://platform.deepseek.com/profile){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"} \--\> 「Delete」.

**Important:** This action will also delete your Chat account, and all
chat history will be permanently deleted. Any remaining balance in your
Open Platform account will be forfeited. Please proceed with caution.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Billing[​](#billing "Direct link to Billing"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Billing"} {#billing .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

### How to Top Up?[​](#how-to-top-up "Direct link to How to Top Up?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to How to Top Up?"} {#how-to-top-up .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

You can top up online via PayPal, bank card, Alipay, or WeChat Pay on
the [「Top Up」](https://platform.deepseek.com/top_up){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"} page. You can check the results on the
[「Billing」](https://platform.deepseek.com/transactions){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"} page.

### Is there any expiration date for my balance?[​](#is-there-any-expiration-date-for-my-balance "Direct link to Is there any expiration date for my balance?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Is there any expiration date for my balance?"} {#is-there-any-expiration-date-for-my-balance .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

Your topped-up balance will not expire. You can check the expiration
date of the granted balance on the [「 Billing
」](https://platform.deepseek.com/transactions){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"} page.

### Is a refund possible?[​](#is-a-refund-possible "Direct link to Is a refund possible?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Is a refund possible?"} {#is-a-refund-possible .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

Unused balances are refundable.

Go to the [「 Billing
」](https://platform.deepseek.com/transactions){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"} page, and click 「Refunds」 to process the
refund yourself.

### How to view usage by API Key[​](#how-to-view-usage-by-api-key "Direct link to How to view usage by API Key"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to How to view usage by API Key"} {#how-to-view-usage-by-api-key .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

Follow these steps to view detailed usage for each API Key:

1.  Go to the
    [「Usage」](https://platform.deepseek.com/usage){target="_blank"
    rel="noopener noreferrer"} page.

2.  Select the relevant month and click 「Export」.

3.  Download and unzip the usage data package. You will find two CSV
    files.

4.  The file named amount contains usage details broken down by Key.

### Incorrect Top-up Balance[​](#incorrect-top-up-balance "Direct link to Incorrect Top-up Balance"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Incorrect Top-up Balance"} {#incorrect-top-up-balance .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

-   Verify that the top-up account matches the currently logged-in
    account.

-   If you have a Google account, try logging into the Platform with
    Google to check if the historical payments are in that account.

-   If you deleted a phone-registered account and re-registered, the new
    account is independent of the old one. If the old account had a
    balance, it couldn\'t be used. [Submit a
    ticket](https://trtgsjkv6r.feishu.cn/share/base/form/shrcnhcHE4A6lQaQ3v0raCXmBAg){target="_blank"
    rel="noopener noreferrer"}, select 「Refund Request」, and provide
    the necessary information.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## API Call[​](#api-call "Direct link to API Call"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to API Call"} {#api-call .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

### Are there any rate limits when calling your API? Can I increase the limits for my account?[​](#are-there-any-rate-limits-when-calling-your-api-can-i-increase-the-limits-for-my-account "Direct link to Are there any rate limits when calling your API? Can I increase the limits for my account?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Are there any rate limits when calling your API? Can I increase the limits for my account?"} {#are-there-any-rate-limits-when-calling-your-api-can-i-increase-the-limits-for-my-account .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

The rate limit exposed on each account is adjusted dynamically according
to our real-time traffic pressure and each account\'s short-term
historical usage.

We temporarily do not support increasing the dynamic rate limit exposed
on any individual account, and there is a unified pricing standard and
no tiered plans. Thanks for your understanding.

### Why do I feel that your API\'s speed is slower than the web service?[​](#why-do-i-feel-that-your-apis-speed-is-slower-than-the-web-service "Direct link to Why do I feel that your API's speed is slower than the web service?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Why do I feel that your API's speed is slower than the web service?"} {#why-do-i-feel-that-your-apis-speed-is-slower-than-the-web-service .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

The web service uses streaming output, i.e., every time the model
outputs a token, it will be displayed incrementally on the web page.

The API uses non-streaming output (stream=false) by default, i.e., the
model\'s output will not be returned to the user until the generation is
done completely. You can use streaming output in your API call to
optimize interactivity.

### Why are empty lines continuously returned when calling the API?[​](#why-are-empty-lines-continuously-returned-when-calling-the-api "Direct link to Why are empty lines continuously returned when calling the API?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Why are empty lines continuously returned when calling the API?"} {#why-are-empty-lines-continuously-returned-when-calling-the-api .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

To prevent the TCP connection from being interrupted due to timeout, we
continuously return empty lines (for non-streaming requests) or SSE
keep-alive comments (`: keep-alive`，for streaming requests) while
waiting for the request to be scheduled. If you are parsing the HTTP
response yourself, please make sure to handle these empty lines or
comments appropriately.

### Does your API support LangChain?[​](#does-your-api-support-langchain "Direct link to Does your API support LangChain?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Does your API support LangChain?"} {#does-your-api-support-langchain .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

Yes. You can refer to the demo code below, which demonstrates how to use
LangChain with DeepSeek API. Replace the API key in the code as
necessary.

[deepseek_langchain.py](https://cdn.deepseek.com/api-docs/deepseek_langchain.py){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"}

### How to calculate token usage offline?[​](#how-to-calculate-token-usage-offline "Direct link to How to calculate token usage offline?"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to How to calculate token usage offline?"} {#how-to-calculate-token-usage-offline .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_YAqC}

Please refer to [Token & Token
Usage](https://api-docs.deepseek.com/quick_start/token_usage){target="_blank"
rel="noopener noreferrer"}
:::
